rules_text:
Deathtouch
[i]Steal[/i] – Whenever an opponent sacrifices a token, if Sothe, Zephyr is tapped, you may create a copy of the sacrificed token.
[i]Blossom[/i] – If one or more counters would be put on a creature you control, that many plus one of each of those kinds of counters are put on that creature instead.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Sothe deals combat damage to a player, support 2.
Partner with Micaiah, Silver Haired Maiden
